# collapsedRepresentation

**Instance Property**

The view displayed when this item is displayed in its parent bar.

## Declaration

```swift
@MainActor var collapsedRepresentation: NSView { get set }
```

## Discussion

By default, this is an [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSButton] whose target is this popover item, whose action is [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopoverTouchBarItem/showPopover(_:)], and whose image and title are bound to this item’s [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopoverTouchBarItem/collapsedRepresentationImage] and [doc://com.apple.appkit/documentation/AppKit/NSPopoverTouchBarItem/collapsedRepresentationImage] respectively.

## Configuring the collapsed popover

- **collapsedRepresentationImage**: The image displayed by the button for the default collapsed representation.
- **collapsedRepresentationLabel**: The localized string displayed by the button for the default collapsed representation.
